title: Corporate Social Responsibility Weekly Recap (August 26, 2015 – September 2, 2015)
text:
Friday, September 4, 2015 9:45AM IST (4:15AM GMT) Corporate Social Responsibility Weekly Recap (August 26, 2015 – September 2, 2015) New York, United States The following releases focus on Corporate Social Responsibility and moved during the week of August 26, 2015 – September 2, 2015. CHICAGO -- Study Finds Bank of America Chicago Marathon Delivers More Than $254 Million to Chicago Economy Source: Bank of America DETROIT -- Ford Inspires Tomorrow’s Leaders Today with New Global Grant, Innovative Employee Civic Leadership Program Source: Ford Motor Company ST. LOUIS -- Wells Fargo HomeLIFT Program to Help St. Louis Homebuyers Source: Wells Fargo & Company Bill Ford to Celebrate 10th Anniversary of Ford Volunteer Corps, Announce New ‘Better World’ Initiatives Source: Ford Motor Company Follow the CSR Circuit newsfeed on www.twitter.com/BWCSRNews ALL TIME-OFFS ARE IN EASTERN TIME View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150903005255/en/ For News Release background on Business Wire click here CONTACTS : Business Wire Matt VanTassel, 212-752-9600 More News from Business Wire 27/08/2015 4:20PM
